resources.string: The item you are trying to access cannot be found.

Example itinerary:
 Semarang → GA233 → Jakarta → QR955 → Doha → QR946 → Amsterdam
 
 ✈️ DEPARTURE (You are leaving from Semarang):
 
 Please enter the flight number for the JAKARTA → SEMARANG segment only.
 This is the domestic connecting flight after your international departure.
 
 You DO NOT need to enter:
 - Semarang → Jakarta
 - Any earlier international segments
 
 ✅ You must enter:
 Flight Number: GA233 (Jakarta → Semarang)
 
 Why this matters:
 - We only track entry and exit segments connected to Indonesia.
 - This helps us coordinate your arrival and departure.

Example itinerary:
 Amsterdam → QR947 → Doha → QR954 → Jakarta → GA234 → Semarang
 
 ✈️ ARRIVAL (You are arriving in Semarang):
 
 Please enter the flight number for the DOHA → JAKARTA segment only.
 This is your main international flight into Indonesia.
 
 You DO NOT need to enter:
 - Amsterdam → Doha
 - Jakarta → Semarang
 
 ✅ You must enter:
 Flight Number: QR954 (Doha → Jakarta)
 
 Why this matters:
 - We only track entry and exit segments connected to Indonesia.
 - This helps us coordinate your arrival and departure.
Note: Please enter only the flight number that marks your official entry into or exit from Indonesia.\n This ensures accurate tracking of your travel schedule.
1. Show this QR Code when arrive\n2. Wait for agent to confirm your booking trip\n3. Check-in Complete
* Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
